title: Find the Missing Letters
content:
o.

How to unlock Find the Missing Letters

Speak to Danzo Arkwright about Gomwick.

Find the Missing Letters Rewards

Find the Missing Letters Walkthrough

In the north part of Rivington, opposite to the Open Hand Temple, is the Sword Coast Couriers. During Act 1, if you found Scratch and Gomwick in the north part of the Forest, you can bring up Gomwick's demise to the person in charge. Speak to the man behind the counter, Danzo Arkwright, and you'll have the following dialogue choices:

I'm so
